thread.title: Pricey $325,000 wedding called off sparks lawsuit
thread.title_full: Pricey $325,000 wedding called off sparks lawsuit

title: Pricey $325,000 wedding called off sparks lawsuit
text: Glitzy $325,000 wedding is suddenly called off after a fight erupts during the rehearsal dinner - sparking a lawsuit from the bride's family against ex-groom's parents for nuptials bill Bradley Moss, 31, and Amy Bzura, 27, were engaged for nearly a year Manhattan-based couple had been expected to get married in October 2016 But apparent fight erupted during rehearsal dinner that caused wedding to be called-off Bzura's family is suing the Mosses, as they are in disagreement over who is supposed to foot the $325,000 bill Bradley is also suing Amy for the $125,000 engagement ring Published: 22:08 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 03:32 GMT, 13 February 2017 29 shares
